title: 25 Days Christmas Watch Face
summary: Can't wait 'til Christmas? Countdown with this fun Android Wear watch face!
description: This fun Christmas themed watch face displays the day, date and time along with a countdown of the days until Christmas! There are 25 different backgrounds for your watch face from which to choose. Press and hold the watch face and tap the gear icon to choose your favorite design or select the "Change Daily" option to get a new watch face each day, counting down the 25 days of Christmas!::Features::- Works on Round and Square watches- 12 or 24 hour modes- Countdown to December 24 or 25- Includes all 25 watch face designs!- "Change Daily" option automatically sets a new design everyday- Special Christmas Eve and Christmas Day Designs- A special "Merry Christmas" greeting on the 24th or 25th!If you've tried and love the free version of this watch face, download this paid version to get more designs and support the developers who work hard to make fun watch faces!To setup 24 hour mode or countdown to December 24th, simply use the configuration app on your phone to set your preferences. This app can be found within the Android Wear app by selecting the Christmas Countdown Watch Face app and then selecting the gear symbol on it.After installing this watch face, you may need to restart your phone and watch to make it display on your Android Wear watch. If you have further trouble, follow the syncing instructions on this page: http://apps.shameronstudios.com/how-to-setup-an-android-wear-watch-face/Permissions explanation:prevent device from sleeping - This is used to keep the ambient version of the watch face running
descriptionHTML:
This fun Christmas themed watch face displays the day, date and time along with a countdown of the days until Christmas! There are 25 different backgrounds for your watch face from which to choose. Press and hold the watch face and tap the gear icon to choose your favorite design or select the "Change Daily" option to get a new watch face each day, counting down the 25 days of Christmas!

::Features::
- Works on Round and Square watches
- 12 or 24 hour modes
- Countdown to December 24 or 25
- Includes all 25 watch face designs!
- "Change Daily" option automatically sets a new design everyday
- Special Christmas Eve and Christmas Day Designs
- A special "Merry Christmas" greeting on the 24th or 25th!

If you've tried and love the free version of this watch face, download this paid version to get more designs and support the developers who work hard to make fun watch faces!

To setup 24 hour mode or countdown to December 24th, simply use the configuration app on your phone to set your preferences. This app can be found within the Android Wear app by selecting the Christmas Countdown Watch Face app and then selecting the gear symbol on it.

After installing this watch face, you may need to restart your phone and watch to make it display on your Android Wear watch. If you have further trouble, follow the syncing instructions on this page: http://apps.shameronstudios.com/how-to-setup-an-android-wear-watch-face/

Permissions explanation:
prevent device from sleeping - This is used to keep the ambient version of the watch face running
comments: Love love love! Fun way to countdown to Christmas and beautiful themes.
Love the watch faces but... Please let us decide whether to use the countdown or not. Then it will be perfect!
Beautiful Beautiful watch faces. I love them all.
Great app Works well on a Moto 360 2nd gen.
recentChanges: New watch faces! 25 in total! "Change Daily" mode will automatically change your watch face to one of the 25 watch faces included every day.
v3.1: Fixed a bug with the LG G Watch. Updated the order for "Change Daily".
